verbose_text: Two additional notable examples are the genes encoding the cell surface proteins, EPCAM and PECAM1, which show reciprocal changes in expression following Zic3 depletion (XREF_FIG A, highlighted in purple) and are usually expressed at distinct times during the differentiation process, with PECAM1 being an ESC marker and EPCAM an EpiLC marker (XREF_FIG C and 4D).
